casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Rodney Santonio HOPPER, Jr. No. 157P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 3, 2007. Elizabeth J. Weese, Assistant Attorney General, Rick Shaffer, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 28th day of March 2007 by Defendant for Petition for Discretionary Review Under G.S. 7A-31:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 3rd day of May 2007."
